text: Va (ʙigu ej Caʙrail ʙa Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam), mo faristagon furud nameoem az osmon ʙa zamin, magar ʙa amri Parvardigori tu. Xosi Ust ilmi on ci az pesi most (ilmi omadani qijomat) va ilmi on ci aqiʙi most (on ci guzast az dunjo) va on ci ʙajni dunjo va oxirat ast. Va Parvardigori tu hargiz faromuskor nest
